p: Antibiotic resistance was observed in 28 S. aureus strains (80%) and ten resistance profiles were observed: three profiles of monoresistance ( n = 5, 17.8%), three cross-resistance to beta-lactams ( n = 8; 28.6%) and four multidrug resistant ( n = 15; 53.6%) (Table 1). From the 28 resistant strains, 7 (25%) showed plasmid of 12,000 bp (Fig. 1).
